content.text: The accessibility and availability of proposed locations of closures in accordance with the installation  schedule shall be confirmed. The client shall be advised of all necessary deviations or actions required.
a) fixed or mounted in position using the recommended fittings;
b) labelled and identified according to the installation specification.
Optical fibre adaptors within closures shall be fixed or fitted with suitable protective caps to prevent the  ingress of foreign material.
Documentation shall be provided to enable subsequent installation of the cabling into the closures.
